alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 4:46PM CDT until April 17 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raymond, or near Clinton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jackson around 450 PM CDT. Byram around 505 PM CDT. Richland around 515 PM CDT. Pearl and Flowood around 520 PM CDT. Florence around 525 PM CDT. Brandon, Star and Monterey around 530 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
